original_text: A man called Crispus was the leader of the Jewish meeting place there. He, and everyone else who lived in his house, believed in the Lord Jesus. Many other people in Corinth heard Paul's message and they believed in Jesus. When they became believers, someone baptized them.
korean_text: 또 회당장 그리스보가 온 집안과 더불어 주를 믿으며 수많은 고린도 사람도 듣고 믿어 세례를 받더라

sentences.original_text: A man called Crispus was the leader
of the Jewish meeting place there
He, and everyone else who lived in his house
sentences.korean_translation: 그와 그의 집에 사는 다른 모든 사람들

sentences.original_text: Many other people in Corinth heard Paul's message
sentences.korean_translation: 고린도의 다른 많은 사람들이 바울의 메시지를 들었습니다
